title: can we not fully rework swain....
body:
i've just started enjoying playing him, does he really need a full rework? cant we just mini rework his abilities....

i agree he needs a vis update, but is his kit really that bad? no 

does he struggle to lane against most champs if the player is decent? no 

does he struggle to find a place in league like most reworks? no he can do very well , early mid and late game being a high dps mage or tank mage.

does his kit go well together? yes and can get you some very good trades in lane,comboing q+e+w+r and a lot of kill potential late game with an aoe root and tons of damage and sustain in team fights.

stop totally stripping these champs of all of there former identity and just giving them a small part of there old kit because lets face it..... there played fanatically for like a week, then by about a month there back were they were...barely ever seen again. as many people have stated you may aswell just release new champions they've changed that much.

replies.body: Nothing about his kit screams tactician, though. His kit is _awful_. He needs to be reworked, but not now.
https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/emoticons/v1/4057/3.0  i cant press r and one shot someone... his kit is garbage https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/emoticons/v1/4057/3.0

Uhh. That's pretty much all swain does.

I like the changes they made with his Q bird, but still looking forward to a full rework, they just make the champion so much better like Urgot. My guess for the rework since they want Swain more like a tactician, is that he will have those sort of moves when human form and then when he becomes his bird form, he'll have some extra moves to go with it and it'll be more like a rage kit instead of tactician.

I agree, Swain like most old champs is just in need of a VU, not a rework.

He's strong _(maybe even too strong)_, he's unique, he has a niche that no other champ fills _(the only one that comes close is Vladimir)_.

With a new Vo and VU, he would have a clean new identity as Noxus' tactician. 
Theres no need to re-work what already works.

Poppy
Sion
Yorick
Urgot
Taric
Warwick
etc etc.

are all played only 1 or 2% more than they were pre-rework.
So clearly, reworks are not the answer to champion popularity.

I mean, swain could have a kit that makes him feel more like a 'tactician' rather than just a brainless "miss everything, but just ult an win" champ, but his kit works, and works well as a whole.

If we have to offer up a sacrifice to be reworked. Why not rework Mordekaiser? He's a terrible model, his kit is weird and confusing, no one in the world knows where he is supposed to go or what he is supposed to do. and the one place they try to force him to go _(ADC)_ he's shit.

Meanwhile swain is pretty solidified in his role as top/mid lane bruiser.

yeah they really fucked morde over tbh, he used to be good and i frequently played him.
